Title: How I Got My Laser Eye Injury - Funranium Labs

Title: 2024-07-31 just disconnect the internet
Description:
So, let's say that a security vendor, we'll call them ClownStrike, accidentally
takes down most of their Windows install base with a poorly tested content
update. Rough day at the office, huh? There are lots of things you could say
about this, lots of reasons it happens this way, lots of people to blame and
not to blame, etc., etc., but nearly every time a major security incident like
this hits the news, you see a lot of people repeating an old refrain:

Title: How I Computer in 2024

get things done, and how I configure things.
